description:
Grudge Match
Release : Grudge.Match.2013.1080p.BluRay.x264.SPARKS.Dual-Soares

The story of retired boxers Billy " The Kid " McGuigan ( Robert De Niro ) and Henry " Razor" Sharp ( Sylvester Stallone ) , former rivals who are persuaded to leave retirement and back into the ring for one last big fight , decades after its last fight . The rivals have fought two memorable fights in the 80s , with a favorable outcome for each. The third fight that would prove who was the best , not because Razor retired unexpectedly. After 30 years, they have the chance to finally find out who the real champion is .
